basics.name: Jamie Southworth
basics.label: IT Professional
basics.summary: IT Professional with 20+ years of experience in desktop support, training, and system administration. Skilled in troubleshooting, software deployment, and user education, with certifications including Microsoft Certified IT Professional, A+, and Network+. Known for being personable, reliable, and compassionate, with a proven ability to bridge technology and people.

work.summary: Over a decade of technical support and training, ensuring smooth operation of hardware/software systems across campuses.
highlights: Delivered comprehensive technical support and training across computers, mobile devices, and various tech products.
Managed ticketing systems: delegated/handled tickets, ensured proper routing, timely completion, and thorough documentation.
Led training sessions for Office 365 email functions across multiple campuses.
Collaborated with software and hardware vendors to evaluate and discuss technology products.
Performed preventive maintenance, testing, and repair to ensure equipment reliability in a dynamic environment.

work.summary: Provided frontline IT helpdesk support in a high-volume corporate environment.
highlights: Provided phone and remote support; completed assigned tickets with precision and clear documentation.
Troubleshot hardware/software systems and contributed to an upgrade of ~1,000 machines.
Fielded 30â€“40 calls daily, maintaining efficiency and quality in a fast-paced environment.

certificates.name: Microsoft Certified Professional / MCSA / MCITP / MCTS
